"Ah, <%me>. Perfect timing.": "...I owe you an apology, for what happened in the mothership the other day. I have no idea what came over me."
"1. No worries"
"2. It wasn't your fault."
"...those are kind words but if I don't apologize, I won't be at peace."
"Even under the influence of AVIS, it is inexcusable that I turned my blade on a comrade."
"...as I am now, I still cannot protect a soul. I must devote myself harder to training."
"...Hey, <%me>. Can you spare a moment?"
"...about what happened earlier, I wanted to say I'm sorry. I'm really, really sorry."
"1. Uh, don't worry about it."
"2. Well, it wasn't your fault."
"I'm so happy to hear that. But I can't forgive myself unless I apologize."
"Even with AVIS in effect, the fact is I fought my ally."
"I thought I was strong, but I now know I am weak. I am still inexperienced. I must train harder."
"You guys say the same exact things, you'd think you'd be a perfect match! Instead, you're always both such a pain in the ass!"
"Oh my, I'm sorry. Did I scare you? I wasn't trying to."
"Did you think I'm here to apologize? Nuh-uh, not at all! They're doing that for me."
"Lisa came to say thank you!"
"Thank you for what? For such a fun fight! And all the other stuff!"
"And so, thank you ve~~ry much!"
"Time for Lisa to go have even more fun! Until next time. See you around!"
